The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

int32_t DPEDMA_setup_shadow_link ( EDMA_Handle  handle,
uint8_t  chId,
uint16_t  shadowParamId,
EDMA_paramSetConfig_t *  config,
EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn_t  transferCompletionCallbackFxn,
uintptr_t  transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg 
)

Description
Utility function for linking EDMA channel with a shadow link paramset

Parameters
[in]handleEDMA handle.
[in]chIdEDMA channel id
[in]shadowParamIdEDMA channel shadow id
[in]configPointer to EDMA paramset configuration
[in]transferCompletionCallbackFxnTransfer completion call back function.
[in]transferCompletionCallbackFxnArgArgument for transfer completion call back function.
Return values
EDMAdriver error code, see "EDMA_ERROR_CODES" in EDMA API.
